title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-3.2 - Enforceability of design concept and scope, and project-level mitigation and control measures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 240-3.2 - Enforceability of design concept and scope, and project-level mitigation and control measures

State Regulations

Written commitments to mitigation measures must be
obtained prior to a positive conformity determination, and the project sponsors
must comply with such commitments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
240-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
